TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT STG_ADVERT.BATCHNUM, STG_ADVERT.AD_ID, STG_ADVERT.CLIPPER_VERSION, STG_ADVERT.PUB_VERSION, STG_ADVERT.CLIPPER_ADVERTISER_REF, STG_ADVERT.CANCEL_FLAG, STG_ADVERT.WP_FLAG, STG_ADVERT.NATIONAL_FLAG, STG_ADVERT.CONTRACT_NUM FROM STG_ADVERT WHERE STG_ADVERT.BATCHNUM>$$last_adv_batchnum

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DIM_ADVERT.ADVERT_KEY as ADVERT_KEY , DIM_ADVERT.AD_ID as AD_ID , DIM_ADVERT.CLIPPER_VERSION as CLIPPER_VERSION FROM DIM_ADVERT where DELETED != 'Y' and (AD_ID, CLIPPER_VERSION)in ( SELECT AD_ID, CLIPPER_VERSION FROM temp_STG_ADVERT)

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT STG_ADVERT.AD_ID, STG_ADVERT.CLIPPER_VERSION FROM STG_ADVERT WHERE STG_ADVERT.BATCHNUM>$$last_adv_batchnum

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Update Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: UPDATE DIM_ADVERT SET CURRENT_VERSION = :TU.CURRENT_VERSION where AD_ID = :TU.AD_ID and CLIPPER_VERSION < :TU.CLIPPER_VERSION
